mapper.insert: insert into store(storeId, storeName, address, streetAddr, openDate, serviceTime, mapId, latitude, longitude, status, homepage, rate, category1, category2, category3, phoneNum) values( seq_store.nextval, #{storeName}, #{address}, #{streetAddr}, #{openDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{serviceTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{longitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homepage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{phoneNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select storeId from store where latitude = #{latitude} and storeName = #{storeName}
